SELECT nick, m.id FROM user_table u, member m WHERE m.s_num=#{ id } AND m.id = u.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO homework(id, workload, sn_num) VALUES(#{ id }, #{ workload }, #{ sn_num })
INSERT INTO study_notice(sn_num, s_num, subject, meeting_info, content, addr) VALUES(sn_code, #{ s_num }, #{ subject }, #{ meeting_info }, #{ content }, #{ addr })
